effect.black_white: Only usable if the user is sleeping. Inflicts regular damage. Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
effect.black_2_white_2: Only usable if the user is sleeping. Inflicts regular damage. Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.

short_effect.black_white: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch. Only works if the user is sleeping.
short_effect.black_2_white_2: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch. Only works if the user is sleeping.

flavor_text.black_white: An attack that can be used only if the user is asleep. The harsh noise may also make the target flinch.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: An attack that can be used only if the user is asleep. The harsh noise may also make the target flinch.
